definition: mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
an exit/CL:個|个[ge4]/to speak/to export/(of a ship) to leave port
to import/imported/entrance/inlet (for the intake of air, water etc)
window/opening providing restricted access (e.g. customer service window)/computer operating system window/fig. medium/intermediary/showpiece/testing ground
population (counted as number of households for census or taxation)/registered residence/residence permit/(in Hong Kong and Macau) bank account
Haikou prefecture-level city and capital of Hainan Province 海南省[Hai3 nan2 Sheng3]
estuary/coastal inlet/river mouth/seaport/see also 誇海口|夸海口[kua1 hai3 kou3]
Haikou prefecture-level city and capital of Hainan Province 海南省[Hai3 nan2 Sheng3]
estuary/coastal inlet/river mouth/seaport/see also 誇海口|夸海口[kua1 hai3 kou3]

sentences.english: You can get the norwalk virus from hand to mouth activity or from contaminated food.
sentences.chinese: 你可以得到手諾瓦克病毒污染的食物或活動口。

sentences.english: Hold the mouth of a balloon filled with air. Let it go suddenly.
sentences.chinese: 捏緊一個充氣的汽球口，然後突然鬆開手。

sentences.english: I send one to you eat, I believe you will like.
sentences.chinese: 我送一個給你喫口巴，相信你一定會喜歡的。

sentences.english: Conclusion Myofibroblast is the main cause to result in scar contracture of bilioenteric anastomosis.
sentences.chinese: 是導致膽腸吻合口瘢痕性攣縮的主要原因。

sentences.english: Most animals walking on four legs have long muzzles.
sentences.chinese: 大多數用四肢走路的動物口鼻部分都相當長。

sentences.english: It arranged for its importation into England with the intention of re-exporting it.
sentences.chinese: 被告意圖將這批藥品進口至英格蘭後再轉出口。

sentences.english: Clean the injector port, replace critical injection port seals, replace injection port liners, and change septa as needed.
sentences.chinese: 清洗進樣口，如有必要，更換密封墊，襯管，隔墊。

sentences.english: Diagnosis of leakage was made by clinical features or abdominal CT-scans.
sentences.chinese: 吻合口瘻的診斷主要依據臨牀表現和腹部CT。

sentences.english: In theaters, the loft is the area above and Behind the proscenium .
sentences.chinese: 劇場裏的閣樓是在臺口上面和後面的區域。

sentences.english: A bulb syringe is often used for oral and nasal suction on infants and children .
sentences.chinese: 常常使用球吸引器抽吸嬰幼兒的口鼻。

sentences.english: You can often save a person's life by breathing into his mouth.
sentences.chinese: 採用口對口呼吸常能搶救一個人的生命。

sentences.english: A word once spoken cannot be taken back, even with a team of four horses.
sentences.chinese: 一句話說出了口，就是套上四匹馬拉的車也難追上。

sentences.english: The doctor sliced his arm open right in front of us.
sentences.chinese: 醫生當着我們的面在他胳膊上割開一條口。

sentences.english: He took a sip of tea making a slurping noise.
sentences.chinese: 他喝了口茶，發出嘶嘶的聲音。

sentences.english: The intake manifold connects the carburetor to the intake ports of the engine.
sentences.chinese: 進氣歧管把發動機進氣道口連接起來。

sentences.english: In the second century Galen pinned it on a dryness of the tongue.
sentences.chinese: 二世紀時，蓋倫將口喫歸咎於舌頭乾燥。

definition: readily/flatly (deny, admit and so on)/a mouthful/a bite
big mouthful (of food, drink, smoke etc)/open mouth/gulping/gobbling/gaping
to breathe/to suck in/to absorb/to inhale
to be able to read aloud fluently/to be suitable (easy enough) for reading aloud
to open one's mouth (to speak, esp. to make a request)/to gape
